xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/410205-All Governments Lie: Truth, Deception, and the Spirit of I.F. Stone 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7u431LSZ9EnFeXOUnhIdCsqlTlA.jpg Vancouver-based filmmaker and TV news veteran Fred Peabody explores the life and legacy of the maverick American journalist I.F. Stone, whose long one-man crusade against government deception lives on in the work of such contemporary filmmakers and journalists as Laura Poitras, Glenn Greenwald, David Corn, and Matt Taibbi. All Governments Lie: Truth, Deception, and the Spirit of I.F. Stone
